title: Kourtney Kardashian posts sexy snap in sheer white corset with veiled bride emoji caption
text:
She's been confronted with her ex and father of her children hanging around with his much younger girlfriend, and she's had to deal with it on national television.

But Kourtney Kardashian, who has recently said she's 'content' being single, looked carefree and very sexy in a social media share on Friday, in which the reality star is decked out in a busty sheer white corset that accentuates her ample chest and teeny waist.

The mother of three, 40, had a smoldering look on her face as she peered directly at the camera, her dark hair down and askew.

Wowsers: Kourtney Kardashian looked carefree and very sexy in a social media share on Friday, in which the reality star is decked out in a busty sheer white corset

Kourtney paired the beguiling top with a pair of crisp cream-colored khakis, and light footwear.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star's bra can be easily seen underneath the bustier.

Curiously, KK captioned the snap with the 'bride with veil' emoji, along with a twinkle symbol.

It was not immediately clear whether she was simply referring to the white top she was wearing, which presumably could be taken for bridal undergarments, or whether she meant something more significant.

Dealing: Recently, Kourtney has been confronted with her ex Scott Disick hanging around with his much younger girlfriend Sofia Richie, and she's had to deal with it on national television

KK has recently been featured on her show detailing her life and that of her famous sisters and family, going on a rather awkward vacation with ex Scott Disick, 3 , and his much younger girlfriend Sofia Richie, 21.

It was also recently confirmed that the oldest Kardashian sister has not rekindled with ex Younes Bendjmina, but the pair do remain friends.

On the upcoming episode of KUWTK, Kourtney had a heart to heart chat with bestie Larsa Pippen in which she said 'I'm content hanging out with my friends. I just feel like I'm on a different vibe. I feel so content with just myself.'

Confessional: On the next KUWTK, Kourtney has a heart to heart chat with bestie Larsa Pippen in which she said 'I'm content hanging out with my friends' and not dating

'I just feel like I'm in a different place where I feel just don't feel like I need that,' the Poosh founder also said.

The scene was filmed at a crucial time in Kourtney's personal life.

During the time of the vacation she had recently split from ex Bendjima and had also cut things off with fling Luka Sabbat.

Regardless, it appears that Kourtney is quite happy being single and sharing scintillating selfies — just yesterday, she got a shout-out from none other than Jennifer Lopez for posing topless in Jlo's jeans designed for Kohl's.
